simplerMultiTouch.library

Class OSCBundle

  • java.lang.Object
    • simplerMultiTouch.library.OSCPacket
      • simplerMultiTouch.library.OSCBundle

  • public class OSCBundle
extends OSCPacket
    A bundle represents a collection of OSC packets (either messages or other bundles) and has a time-tag which can be used by a scheduler to execute a bundle in the future, instead of immediately. OSCMessages are executed immediately. Bundles should be used if you want to send multiple messages to be executed atomically together, or you want to schedule one or more messages to be executed in the future.
    Author:
    Chandrasekhar Ramakrishnan
